remarks: Standard inner product on complex numbers.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
statement:
recld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
readdd.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
ipcnd $p |- ( ph -> ( Re ` ( A x. ( * ` B ) ) ) = ( ( ( Re ` A ) x. ( Re ` B ) ) + ( ( Im ` A ) x. ( Im ` B ) ) ) ) $.
